member.name: T:PaintProg.Intro
member.summary: Shows an introductory pop-up.

member.name: F:PaintProg.Intro.components
member.summary: Designer variable used to keep track of non-visual components.

member.name: M:PaintProg.Intro.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes resources used by the form.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PaintProg.Intro.InitializeComponent
member.summary: This method is required for Windows Forms designer support. Do not change the method contents inside the source code editor. The Forms designer might not be able to load this method if it was changed manually.

member.name: T:PaintProg.MainForm
member.summary: Main window of the application.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.rectGetter
member.summary: Contains supportive calculations for getting data about drawn rectangles and ellipses. This is a practical example of a custom .dll library.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.fl
member.summary: Contains a function for coloring a single-color area with another color. This is a practical example of a custom .dll library.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.bmp
member.summary: Represents a canvas on which user draws.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.pointsToDraw
member.summary: Used for storing points to create a hand drawn line.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.isEditing
member.summary: Used for storing "editing state" of a program, i.e. if user draws on canvas or not.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.rightPressed
member.summary: Used for checking which mouse button is pressed.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.fillingShapes
member.summary: Used for checking if an user wants to draw a filled shape or an outline of it.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.mX
member.summary: Stores an X-coordinate of a mouse.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.mY
member.summary: Stores an Y-coordinate of a mouse.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.selectedTool
member.summary: Used to store a selected drawing tool.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.penWidth
member.summary: A width of a pen.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.colors
member.summary: Contains information about selected colors([0] - left; [1] - right);

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.helpPoint
member.summary: Supportive point for drawing rectangles and ellipses.

member.name: M:PaintProg.MainForm.ResizeBitmap
member.summary: Changes the size of an canvas(and bitmap as well). The size is dependent on the sizes of the entire canvas form.

member.name: F:PaintProg.MainForm.components
member.summary: Designer variable used to keep track of non-visual components.
